item.title: I might be onto something!
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

That action script is what loads the game. They tried to hide it a little bit so that you couldn’t just use something like sothink to get the client right of the page.

If you notice the line in there:
" _level0.loadMovie(“chat” + loadVar.v + “.swf”);"
It is going to load a client called chat(versionnumberhere).swf

To get the version number, you simply look at http://play.clubpenguin.com/version.txt

So as of this post, the version is 461. Therefore, the actual game client can be found at http://play.clubpenguin.com/chat461.swf

I’ll get you the fla for the current one if you want, but iirc it is obfuscated. I’ll post in a sec with it. edit: Damn, they must have changed the way it works. When I try to save this so I can convert to an fla, it is a blank white screen as is only 55 kb. The last time I did this was version 50, so it’s been a while(maybe I’m doing this wrong to begin with :P).

Read full topic

item.title: I might be onto something!
item.dc:creator: @maxexcloo maxexcloo
item.description:
@maxexcloo wrote:

Here are some links for clubpenguin…

http://play.clubpenguin.com/version.txt

http://play.clubpenguin.com/miniclip.swf
http://play.clubpenguin.com/mc.htm

http://play.clubpenguin.com/load.swf

Disney Home

Disney.com | The official home for all things Disney

The official website for all things Disney: theme parks, resorts, movies, tv programs, characters, games, videos, music, shopping, and more!

Also here is some action script…

[CODE]// Action script…

// [Action in Frame 2]
if (Number(2) == 2)
{
ifFrameLoaded(6)
{
gotoAndStop(6);
} // End of ifFrameLoaded
}
else
{
gotoAndStop(4);
} // end else if

// [Action in Frame 3]
gotoAndPlay(2);

// [Action in Frame 4]
stop ();

// [Action in Frame 5]
stop ();

// [Action in Frame 6]
function getTimeStamp()
{
var myDate = new Date();
var todayMonth = myDate.getMonth();
var todayDate = myDate.getDate();
var todayHours = myDate.getHours();
var todayMinutes = myDate.getMinutes();
return (todayMonth + “|” + todayDate + “|” + todayHours + “|” + todayMinutes);
} // End of the function
function loadVersion()
{
var loadVar = new LoadVars();
loadVar.onLoad = function (success)
{
if (success)
{
_level0.loadMovie(“chat” + loadVar.v + “.swf”);
}
else
{
gotoAndStop(5);
} // end else if
};
if (this._url.substr(0, 4) == “http”)
{
loadVar.load(“version.txt?” + getTimeStamp());
}
else
{
loadVar.load(“version.txt”);
} // end else if
} // End of the function
var playerVersion = getVersion();
playerVersion = playerVersion.split(" “);
playerVersion[1] = playerVersion[1].split(”,");
if (playerVersion[1][0] >= 6)
{
loadVersion();
}
else
{
gotoAndStop(4);
} // end else if
stop ();[/CODE]

If any one can understand this codfe please post here…
